user_bio:
I’m Shahrear, a Software Engineer with over 5 years of experience in full-stack development and workflow automation. I specialize in building intelligent, scalable automations using n8n, helping teams streamline operations and boost productivity.

I’m also an expert in developing custom n8n nodes, with published work on npm - including the @vlm-run/n8n-nodes-vlmrun package. https://github.com/vlm-run/n8n-nodes-vlmrun
